p: Serum samples were collected from mice infected with CHIKV (10 2 FFU) and from mock-infected mice at 5 days post-infection (pi). The cytokines, IFN-γ, IL-2, IL-4, IL-6, IL-10, IL-12P40, MCP-1 and TNF-α levels were measured using a Magnetic bead Milliplex Kit (Millipore, Billerica, MA, USA) according to the manufacturer’s instructions. The plate was read on Luminex-200 TM with xPONENT software (Luminex corporation, Austin, Texas, USA).
